![LitElement component](https://img.shields.io/badge/litElement-component-blue.svg)

# &lt;bbva-header-main&gt;

Main navigation header. Types:

- Modal: modal header of operation.
- Modal third level: modal header that opens under the operational modal.
- Process: end of process header.
- Sign: operations sign header.
- Transparent: Transparent header for login.

Example:

```html
<bbva-header-main
  accessibility-text-icon-left1="Return"
  accessibility-text-icon-left2="Communication"
  accessibility-text-icon-right1="Menu"
  accessibility-text-icon-right2="Help"
  icon-left1="coronita:return-12"
  icon-left2="coronita:communication"
  icon-right1="coronita:menu"
  icon-right2="coronita:help"
  text="Header main"
></bbva-header-main>
```

## Icons

Since this component uses icons, it will need an [iconset](https://platform.bbva.com/en-us/developers/engines/cells/documentation/cells-architecture/composing-with-components/cells-icons) in your project as an application level dependency. In fact, this component uses an iconset in its demo.

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Selector                        | Property or Custom Property                | CSS Variable or value               | Value                                      | Fallback |
| :------------------------------ | :----------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------- | :----------------------------------------- | :------- |
| .header-main                    | padding-top                                | --bbva-header-main-padding-top      | 0                                          |          |
| .header-main                    | min-height                                 | --bbva-header-main-min-height       | calc(var(--bbva-global-spacer, 0.5rem) \*… |          |
| .header-main                    | background-color                           | --bbva-header-main-bg-color         | --bbva-navy                                | #072146  |
| .header-main                    | color                                      | --bbva-header-main-color            | --bbva-white                               | #FFF     |
| .header-main .text              | top                                        | --bbva-header-main-text-top         | --bbva-header-main-padding-top             | 0        |
| .header-main .text              | height                                     | --bbva-header-main-min-height       | calc(var(--bbva-global-spacer, 0.5rem) \*… |          |
| .header-main .text              | padding                                    |                                     | 0 var(--bbva-header-main-text-padding-ho…  |          |
| .header-main .text              | font-size                                  | --bbva-header-main-text-font-size   | 16px                                       |          |
| .header-main .text              | line-height                                | --bbva-header-main-text-line-height | calc(var(--bbva-global-spacer, 0.5rem) \*… |          |
| .header-main .text.full-padding | --bbva-header-main-text-padding-horizontal |                                     | calc(var(--bbva-global-spacer, 0.5rem) \*… |          |
| .header-main .icon              | width                                      | --bbva-header-main-min-height       | calc(var(--bbva-global-spacer, 0.5rem) \*… |          |
| .header-main .icon              | min-height                                 | --bbva-header-main-min-height       | calc(var(--bbva-global-spacer, 0.5rem) \*… |          |
| :host(.modal)                   | --bbva-header-main-bg-color                | --bbva-core-blue                    | #004481                                    |          |
| :host(.modal-three-level)       | --bbva-header-main-bg-color                | --bbva-white                        | #FFF                                       |          |
| :host(.modal-three-level)       | --bbva-header-main-color                   | --bbva-600                          | #121212                                    |          |
| :host(.process)                 | --bbva-header-main-bg-color                | --bbva-dark-green                   | #277A3E                                    |          |
| :host(.sign)                    | --bbva-header-main-bg-color                | --bbva-dark-gold                    | #8E7022                                    |          |
| :host(.transparent)             | --bbva-header-main-bg-color                |                                     | transparent                                |          |

### @apply

| Selector           | Mixin                     |
| :----------------- | :------------------------ |
| .header-main       | --bbva-header-main-header |
| .header-main .icon | --bbva-header-main-icon   |
| :host              | --bbva-header-main        |

### Available classes

| Class              | Description            |
| :----------------- | :--------------------- |
| .modal             | blue background        |
| .modal-three-level | white background       |
| .process           | green background       |
| .process           | gold background        |
| .transparent       | transparent background |
